videos.description: Ben Simmons intercepts the Miami pass and takes off down the court to flush a two-handed dunk on the fast break.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Simmons gets the steal and fast-break dunk) 2021/01/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Simmons gets the steal and fast-break dunk
